validate

Description

Handles all pre and POST requests for FormIt and abstracts hooks and validation processing.

Properties

$clearFieldsAtEnd
jump to class

boolean $clearFieldsAtEnd = 'false'

Set to true if wanting to prevent the clearing of fields at the end
